title: herbal supplements - Spanish translation – Linguee
description: Many translated example sentences containing "herbal supplements" – Spanish-English dictionary and search engine for Spanish translations.

markets of most Member States.

que ya están en el mercado en la mayoría de los Estados miembros.

You should inform your physician[...]
and the technologist performing your exam of any medications you are taking,[...] including vitamins and herbal supplements.

Debe informarle a su médico y al[...]
tecnólogo que realiza el examen de cualquier medicación que se encuentre ingiriendo[...] incluyendo vitaminas y suplementos herbales.

More than half of the[...] herbal and non-herbal supplements were found to [...]
have either an indirect or direct impact on warfarin.

Se halló que más de[...] la mitad de los complementos herbales y no herbales [...]
tenían impactos directos o indirectos sobre la warfarina.

give your body the encouragement it needs to heal itself.

have also gained recognition and popularity as a safe and effective immune system booster.

may not have the same constituents as those described in the studies, and they also may contain impurities.

compra quizás no tengan los mismos constituyentes que aquellos descritos en los estudios,[...]

Judith, her sister, takes herbal supplements to ease the breast [...]
pain that accompanies her period.

You may be asked to stop taking some medicines or herbal supplements up to one week before the procedure, like

No tome aspirina ni otros antiinflamatorios durante una semana antes de la cirugía, a menos que el médico indique lo contrario.

UHTCO makes no claim that its products are anything other[...] than foods and dietary or herbal supplements designed to improve nutrition [...]
and, thereby, optimize health.
